00091 - (id)init
00092 {
00093     return [self initWithItemIdentifier:@""];
00094 }
00095 
00096 // Creating a Toolbar Item
00102 - (id)initWithItemIdentifier:(CPString)anItemIdentifier
00103 {
00104     self = [super init];
00105     
00106     if (self)
00107     {
00108         _itemIdentifier = anItemIdentifier;
00109      
00110         _tag = 0;
00111         _isEnabled = YES;
00112      
00113         _minSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00114         _maxSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00115      
00116         _visibilityPriority = CPToolbarItemVisibilityPriorityStandard;
00117         _autovalidates = YES;
00118     }
00119     
00120     return self;
00121 }

00200         [view setToolTip:aToolTip];

00231 - (id)target
00232 {
00233     if (_view)
00234         return [_view respondsToSelector:@selector(target)] ? [_view target] : nil;
00235

00244 - (void)setTarget:(id)aTarget
00245 {
00246     if (!_view)
00247         _target = aTarget;
00248     
00249     else if ([_view respondsToSelector:@selector(setTarget:)])
00250         [_view setTarget:aTarget];
00251 }

00260

00271         _action = anAction;

00274         [_view setAction:anAction];

00303 - (CPImage)image
00304 {
00305     if ([_view respondsToSelector:@selector(image)])
00306         return [_view image];
00307         
00308     return _image;
00309 }
00310 
00315 - (void)setImage:(CPImage)anImage
00316 {
00317     if ([_view respondsToSelector:@selector(setImage:)])
00318         [_view setImage:anImage];
00319 
00320     _image = anImage;
00321     
00322     if (!_image)
00323         return;
00324     
00325     if (_minSize.width === 0 && _minSize.height === 0 && 
00326         _maxSize.width === 0 && _maxSize.height === 0)
00327     {
00328         var imageSize = [_image size];
00329 
00330         if (imageSize.width > 0 || imageSize.height > 0)
00331         {
00332             [self setMinSize:imageSize];
00333             [self setMaxSize:imageSize];
00334         }
00335     }
00336 }
00337 
00342 - (void)setAlternateImage:(CPImage)anImage
00343 {
00344     if ([_view respondsToSelector:@selector(setAlternateImage:)])
00345         [_view setAlternateImage:anImage];
00346     
00347     _alternateImage = anImage;
00348 }
00349 
00353 - (CPImage)alternateImage
00354 {
00355     if ([_view respondsToSelector:@selector(alternateIamge)])
00356         return [_view alternateImage];
00357     
00358     return _alternateImage;
00359 }
00360 
00364 - (CPView)view
00365 {
00366     return _view;
00367 }
00368 
00373 - (void)setView:(CPView)aView
00374 {
00375     if (_view == aView)
00376         return;
00377     
00378     _view = aView;
00379 
00380     if (_view)
00381     {
00382         // Tags get forwarded.
00383         if (_tag !== 0 && [_view respondsToSelector:@selector(setTag:)])
00384             [_view setTag:_tag];
00385         
00386         _target = nil;
00387         _action = nil;
00388     }
00389 }
00390 
00394 - (CGSize)minSize
00395 {
00396     return _minSize;
00397 }
00398 
00403 - (void)setMinSize:(CGSize)aMinSize
00404 {
00405     if(!aMinSize.height || !aMinSize.width)
00406         return;
00407 
00408     _minSize = CGSizeMakeCopy(aMinSize);
00409     
00410     // Try to provide some sanity: Make maxSize >= minSize
00411     _maxSize = CGSizeMake(MAX(_minSize.width, _maxSize.width), MAX(_minSize.height, _maxSize.height));
00412 }
00413 
00417 - (CGSize)maxSize
00418 {
00419     return _maxSize;
00420 }
00421 
00426 - (void)setMaxSize:(CGSize)aMaxSize
00427 {
00428     if(!aMaxSize.height || !aMaxSize.width)
00429         return;
00430         
00431     _maxSize = CGSizeMakeCopy(aMaxSize);
00432     
00433     // Try to provide some sanity: Make minSize <= maxSize
00434     _minSize = CGSizeMake(MIN(_minSize.width, _maxSize.width), MIN(_minSize.height, _maxSize.height));
00435 }
00436 
00437 // Visibility Priority
00447 - (int)visibilityPriority
00448 {
00449     return _visibilityPriority;
00450 }
00451 
00462 - (void)setVisibilityPriority:(int)aVisibilityPriority
00463 {
00464     _visibilityPriority = aVisibilityPriority;
00465 }
00466 
00467 - (void)validate
00468 {
00469     // View items do not do any target-action analysis.
00470     if (_view)
00471     {
00472         if ([target respondsToSelector:@selector(validateToolbarItem:)])
00473             [self setEnabled:[target validateToolbarItem:self]];
00474 
00475         return;
00476     }
00477 
00478     var action = [self action];
00479 
00480     if (!action)
00481         return [self setEnabled:NO];
00482 
00483     var target = [self target];
00484 
00485     if (target && ![target respondsToSelector:action])
00486         return [self setEnabled:NO];
00487 
00488     target = [CPApp targetForAction:action to:target from:self];
00489 
00490     if (!target)
00491         return [self setEnabled:NO];
00492 
00493     if ([target respondsToSelector:@selector(validateToolbarItem:)])
00494         [self setEnabled:[target validateToolbarItem:self]];
00495     else
00496         [self setEnabled:YES];
00497 }
00498 
00499 - (BOOL)autovalidates
00500 {
00501     return _autovalidates;
00502 }
00503 
00504 - (void)setAutovalidates:(BOOL)shouldAutovalidate
00505 {
00506     _autovalidates = !!shouldAutovalidate;
00507 }

00511 var CPToolbarItemItemIdentifierKey      = @"CPToolbarItemItemIdentifierKey",
00512     CPToolbarItemLabelKey               = @"CPToolbarItemLabelKey",
00513     CPToolbarItemPaletteLabelKey        = @"CPToolbarItemPaletteLabelKey",
00514     CPToolbarItemToolTipKey             = @"CPToolbarItemToolTipKey",
00515     CPToolbarItemTagKey                 = @"CPToolbarItemTagKey",
00516     CPToolbarItemTargetKey              = @"CPToolbarItemTargetKey",
00517     CPToolbarItemActionKey              = @"CPToolbarItemActionKey",
00518     CPToolbarItemEnabledKey             = @"CPToolbarItemEnabledKey",
00519     CPToolbarItemImageKey               = @"CPToolbarItemImageKey",
00520     CPToolbarItemAlternateImageKey      = @"CPToolbarItemAlternateImageKey",
00521     CPToolbarItemViewKey                = @"CPToolbarItemViewKey",
00522     CPToolbarItemMinSizeKey             = @"CPToolbarItemMinSizeKey",
00523     CPToolbarItemMaxSizeKey             = @"CPToolbarItemMaxSizeKey",
00524     CPToolbarItemVisibilityPriorityKey  = @"CPToolbarItemVisibilityPriorityKey",
00525     CPToolbarItemAutovalidatesKey       = @"CPToolbarItemAutovalidatesKey";
00526 
00527 @implementation CPToolbarItem (CPCoding)
00528 
00529 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00530 {
00531     self = [super init];
00532 
00533     if (self)
00534     {
00535         _itemIdentifier = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemItemIdentifierKey];
00536 
00537         _minSize = [aCoder decodeSizeForKey:CPToolbarItemMinSizeKey];
00538         _maxSize = [aCoder decodeSizeForKey:CPToolbarItemMaxSizeKey];
00539 
00540         [self setLabel:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemLabelKey]];
00541         [self setPaletteLabel:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemPaletteLabelKey]];
00542         [self setToolTip:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemToolTipKey]];
00543 
00544         [self setTag:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemTagKey]];
00545         [self setTarget:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemTargetKey]];
00546         [self setAction:CPSelectorFromString([aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemActionKey])];
00547 
00548         [self setEnabled:[aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPToolbarItemEnabledKey]];
00549 
00550         [self setImage:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemImageKey]];
00551         [self setAlternateImage:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemAlternateImageKey]];
00552 
00553         [self setView:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPToolbarItemViewKey]];
00554 
00555         [self setVisibilityPriority:[aCoder decodeIntForKey:CPToolbarItemVisibilityPriorityKey]];
00556         [self setAutovalidates:[aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPToolbarItemAutovalidatesKey]];
00557     }
00558 
00559     return self;
00560 }
00561 
00562 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00563 {
00564     [aCoder encodeObject:_itemIdentifier forKey:CPToolbarItemItemIdentifierKey];
00565 
00566     [aCoder encodeObject:[self label] forKey:CPToolbarItemLabelKey];
00567     [aCoder encodeObject:[self paletteLabel] forKey:CPToolbarItemPaletteLabelKey];
00568 
00569     [aCoder encodeObject:[self toolTip] forKey:CPToolbarItemToolTipKey];
00570 
00571     [aCoder encodeObject:[self tag] forKey:CPToolbarItemTagKey];
00572     [aCoder encodeObject:[self target] forKey:CPToolbarItemTargetKey];
00573     [aCoder encodeObject:[self action] forKey:CPToolbarItemActionKey];
00574 
00575     [aCoder encodeObject:[self isEnabled] forKey:CPToolbarItemEnabledKey];
00576 
00577     [aCoder encodeObject:[self image] forKey:CPToolbarItemImageKey];
00578     [aCoder encodeObject:[self alternateImage] forKey:CPToolbarItemAlternateImageKey];
00579 
00580     [aCoder encodeObject:[self view] forKey:CPToolbarItemViewKey];
00581 
00582     [aCoder encodeSize:[self minSize] forKey:CPToolbarItemMinSizeKey];
00583     [aCoder encodeSize:[self maxSize] forKey:CPToolbarItemMaxSizeKey];
00584 
00585     [aCoder encodeObject:[self visibilityPriority] forKey:CPToolbarItemVisibilityPriorityKey];
00586     [aCoder encodeBool:[self autovalidates] forKey:CPToolbarItemAutovalidatesKey];
00587 }
00588 
00589 @end

00591 @implementation CPToolbarItem (CPCopying)
00592 
00593 - (id)copy
00594 {
00595     var copy = [[[self class] alloc] initWithItemIdentifier:_itemIdentifier];
00596 
00597     if (_view)
00598         [copy setView:[CPKeyedUnarchiver unarchiveObjectWithData:[CPKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:_view]]];
00599 
00600     [copy _setToolbar:_toolbar];
00601 
00602     [copy setLabel:_label];
00603     [copy setPaletteLabel:_paletteLabel];
00604     [copy setToolTip:[self toolTip]];
00605 
00606     [copy setTag:[self tag]];
00607     [copy setTarget:[self target]];
00608     [copy setAction:[self action]];
00609 
00610     [copy setEnabled:[self isEnabled]];
00611 
00612     [copy setImage:[self image]];
00613     [copy setAlternateImage:[self alternateImage]];
00614 
00615     [copy setMinSize:_minSize];
00616     [copy setMaxSize:_maxSize];
00617 
00618     [copy setVisibilityPriority:[self visibilityPriority]];
00619     [copy setAutovalidates:[self autovalidates]];
00620 
00621     return copy;
00622 }

00626 // Standard toolbar identifiers
00627 
00628 @implementation CPToolbarItem (Standard)
00629 
00630 /* @ignore */
00631 + (CPToolbarItem)_standardItemWithItemIdentifier:(CPString)anItemIdentifier
00632 {
00633     switch (anItemIdentifier)
00634     {
00635         case CPToolbarSeparatorItemIdentifier:          return [_CPToolbarSeparatorItem new];
00636         case CPToolbarSpaceItemIdentifier:              return [_CPToolbarSpaceItem new];
00637         case CPToolbarFlexibleSpaceItemIdentifier:      return [_CPToolbarFlexibleSpaceItem new];
00638         case CPToolbarShowColorsItemIdentifier:         return [_CPToolbarShowColorsItem new];
00639         case CPToolbarShowFontsItemIdentifier:          return nil;
00640         case CPToolbarCustomizeToolbarItemIdentifier:   return nil;
00641         case CPToolbarPrintItemIdentifier:              return nil;
00642     }
00643     
00644     return nil;
00645 }
